comments:
Copied from: http://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=11828

1. open 2 java files (A and B)
2. close all perspectives
3. Open Recent...
(should be diabled)
4. Open file A
5. Open file B
==> icons appear in the toolbar

Click next error ==> NPE
